metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Docks roadOne of several delivery dockworkers - NOTE Please rename to Earno Diggums.

0.speaker: Earno Diggums
0.text: Someone ought to give these angry Fists a kind word and a biscuit, but that isn't going to be me.

1.speaker: Earno Diggums
1.text: Think I'll just sit back and rest my weary limbs while these angry youngsters sort matters out.
